MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G62 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45am to safely carry out repairs on our underground cable network in the Boclair View area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:46 AM on Saturday, 31 October 2020
